sentences.english: Opinions on bombing the Serbs cut across party lines.
sentences.chinese: 关于轰炸塞尔维亚的意见违反了党的路线。

sentences.english: The Thunderbolt gained fame as the most powerful and actively used American fighter-bomber used extensively for targeting ground installations.
sentences.chinese: 没想到雷电因此成为了美国最著名的战斗轰炸机。

sentences.english: The Russian Defense Ministry dismissed claims of the airport bombing as disinformation .
sentences.chinese: 俄国防部指出关于轰炸机场的消息并不属实。

sentences.english: The names of the countries bombing the Japanese-like named countries are very European like.
sentences.chinese: 姓名轰炸的国家，日本类似命名为国家非常欧洲等。

sentences.english: Seems to me the desire here is a semi stealthly fighter bomber that is affordable.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来这是架廉价的半隐形战斗轰炸机。

sentences.english: The thirty - six Enterprise dive-bomber were being squandered in a jittery shot from the hip.
sentences.chinese: 这三十六架“企业号”上的俯冲轰炸机正被孤注一掷。

sentences.english: It became the most successful bomber used in World War One.
sentences.chinese: 成了第一次世界大战中战功最卓著的一种轰炸机。

sentences.english: Up to 80 percent of the historic centers of German cities were destroyed by Allied bombs during the war.
sentences.chinese: 达百分之八十的德国城市的历史中心遭到联合轰炸。

sentences.english: The children is evacuate to the country when the city is is bombe.
sentences.chinese: 轰炸时，儿童都疏散到乡下去了。

sentences.english: Our planes bombed the enemy's ship.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞机轰炸了敌舰。

sentences.english: Just then, a whole flight of bombers zoomed over the house.
sentences.chinese: 就在这时，一整队轰炸机从房子上空呼啸而过。

sentences.english: It was the most perfidious and dangerous dive bomber the Germans had.
sentences.chinese: 这是德国人拥有的最出色而危险的俯冲轰炸机。

sentences.english: 2006 – Madrid Barajas International Airport is bombed.
sentences.chinese: 2006年的今天，马德里巴拉哈斯国际机场被轰炸。

sentences.english: Photos and videos of the new stealth bomber were published on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 一种新型隐形轰炸机的图片和视频也在网上公布。

sentences.english: A Lancaster bomber in reasonable condition is worth rescuing.
sentences.chinese: 一架状况尚好的兰开斯特轰炸机值得抢救。

sentences.english: We'll pulverize an area 3.5 miles wide with saturation bombing.
sentences.chinese: 我们将以地毯式轰炸炸平三英里半宽的地区。

definition: to blow up/to destroy with explosives
to throw an explosive charge/to bomb
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
